* UDP direct support (UDP forward will be support in the near future)
* Improve stability (SSR) and performance (battery)

* UDP direct support (UDP forward will be support in the near future)
* Improve stability (SSR) and performance (battery)

==== Enhanced Widget ====
When Potatso is connected:
* You can now view current network status (type, speed, total data transferred) on Today Widget
* You can now switch proxy directly on Today Widget

==== Enhanced Widget ====
When Potatso is connected:
* You can now view current network status (type, speed, total data transferred) on Today Widget
* You can now switch proxy directly on Today Widget

Let's keep pace with the new times.
AEAD ciphers for Shadowsocks is supported now. For more info, please refer to https://shadowsocks.org/en/spec/AEAD-Ciphers.html

Let's keep pace with the new times.
AEAD ciphers for Shadowsocks is supported now. For more info, please refer to https://shadowsocks.org/en/spec/AEAD-Ciphers.html

Yes, you're right! New updates again with a lot of improvements!!!
1. You can hide "No Proxy" in widget now (Settings - Widget - Don't show "No Proxy")
2. You can import proxies by tapping on any proxy URI (ss:// or ssr://)
3. "default" has been

Yes, you're right! New updates again with a lot of improvements!!!
1. You can hide "No Proxy" in widget now (Settings - Widget - Don't show "No Proxy")
2. You can import proxies by tapping on any proxy URI (ss:// or ssr://)
3. "default" has been
Fixed the bug that SSR http_simple cannot connect
Fixed the bug that SSR http_simple cannot connect
Fixed url scheme not work regression
Fixed url scheme not work regression

Congratulations on the grand opening of Google I/O！
* Add support for SSR "auth_chain_a" protocol and "none" encryption
* Add support for HTTP and HTTPS proxy
* You can view your password of proxies in the app now

Congratulations on the grand opening of Google I/O！
* Add support for SSR "auth_chain_a" protocol and "none" encryption
* Add support for HTTP and HTTPS proxy
* You can view your password of proxies in the app now
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Add compatibility for variants of Shadowsocks QR Codes (generated by clients who aren't following the official standard)
- Fixed unable to connect through IPv6 proxy bug

- Add compatibility for variants of Shadowsocks QR Codes (generated by clients who aren't following the official standard)
- Fixed unable to connect through IPv6 proxy bug

We've brought you several exciting features in this version!

* UDP relay is supported now. You can specify "Forward UDP" or "Forward DNS" in profile settings. （Shadowsocks and ShadowsocksR are supported）
* Introduce a new UI for profile manageme

We've brought you several exciting features in this version!

* UDP relay is supported now. You can specify "Forward UDP" or "Forward DNS" in profile settings. （Shadowsocks and ShadowsocksR are supported）
* Introduce a new UI for profile manageme
Fix UDP relay bug
Fix UDP relay bug

1. Bug fix and performance improvements
2. Add support for custom number of session history items

1. Bug fix and performance improvements
2. Add support for custom number of session history items

1. Fix a severe bug (For specific SS/SSR servers, connections for some websites cannot be established)
2. Add ping test and proxy location icons;

1. Fix a severe bug (For specific SS/SSR servers, connections for some websites cannot be established)
2. Add ping test and proxy location icons;

#### IMPORTANT ####
After the upgrade, your local configuration data may lost due to our developer account transfer. Please backup your configuration data.
